channel.title: My Signatures [Updated] + 1
channel.description: I'm a beginner with Photoshop so don't be harsh Well here are some of my sigs: [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2exaihi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/mal0gi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2eq7zg6.png[/img] personally my best untill now, cuz c4d in it (only 2 explosive) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vhx109.png[/img] << the updated one

item.title: My Signatures [Updated] + 1
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

[quote=“atrox_, post:33, topic:283012”][quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=373967.msg2846367#msg2846367 date=1246304622]

Lmao; Apparently you don’t do Photoshop sigs that often.

Lmao; Apparently you’re new here.

Go learn Photoshop, then flame my work and someone else’s.

Why not YOU try to learn photoshop and you will see lot of people will stop flaming you.

I’ve learned what I needed to. I’m not posting another sig since you’ll flame it.

FastBawlz = Moderator of the GRAPHIC section. Your saying he dont know photoshop by saying “Lmao; Apparently you don’t do Photoshop sigs that often.” well how the fuck did he get moderator dumb shit?

Suck my dick fag. I’m not stupid, that isn’t your business if it was. My IQ is much more than 100, so keep your opinion to yourself, and GTFO. I’m saying he shouldn’t flame anyone’s work without me seeing his work first, so go fuck yourself.
[/quote]
Dont mean to burst your bubble or anything mate, but, we have seen your work and its shite.[/quote]
Haven’t seen yours ;). I got much better now, and I’d post if you guys actually gave CnC instead of saying it’s shit.

Read full topic
